game_description: o Stage-based tycoon game o You can enjoy various stories by unlocking the stage o Steak House, Bulgogi House, and Cupcake House consist of three restaurants o More than 30 recipes for each restaurant o After unlocking all stages of each restaurant, competition mode will open.
review_1: Can someone please tell me how to access the English language? Also, when I try to pick u[p the food the mechanics are slow, making the cooking time longer, so I cannot finish the task without people leaving.
